description: A dashboard utilizing metrics collected via "windows_exporter" for Prometheus.

targets.expr:
(irate(windows_net_bytes_received_total{nic!~"isatap.*|VPN.*|.*Pseudo.*", job="$job", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
  + irate(windows_net_bytes_sent_total{nic!~"isatap.*|VPN.*|.*Pseudo.*", job="$job", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval]) ) * 8 / windows_net_current_bandwidth_bytes{nic!~"isatap.*|VPN.*|.*Pseudo.*", job="$job", instance="$instance"} * 100

title: Windows System Overview
